version_description:
Brandneue Features:
• Bei der Erstanmeldung erscheint eine App-Einführung um euch den Einstieg zu erleichtern
• Stores nach Öffnungszeit und Ladenschluss filtern
• Ab sofort könnt ihr eure Erfahrungen mit unseren Partnern bewerten

Wie gewohnt haben wir für euch in dieser Version viele weiter Verbesserungen umgesetzt.

What's fixed
• Crash when launching the app after being logged in with Facebook
• Logout should now work properly

What's new:
• Now you can see how many likes each store has
• Sold out stores are now shown with different icon on map
• Many bug fixes and small design improvements

---
Love the app? Rate it in the App Store and tell others that can help reducing food waste!
If you experience any issues you can always write us directly to info@toogoodtogo.com and we will be happy to help you :)

What's new:
• The payment settings have been redesigned for easier use
• Now you can switch the app language
• Meals availability is updated more frequently
• Several bug fixes and performance improvements

Love the app? Rate it in the App Store and tell others that can help reducing food waste!
If you experience any issues you can always write us directly to info@toogoodtogo.com and we will be happy to help you :)

Introducing: the brand new Too Good To Go app!
We have a new, sparkling app ready for you. It's the same app - only way better.

The features of the new app hopefully speak for themselves. However, here are some of the things we love:

- The map now includes your filtered search results
- The design is beautiful (if we should say so ourselves)
- The purchase process is super smooth
- You can cancel purchases in-app (but why should you want to cancel?)

We are very proud of this new version of the app - we hope you'll love it as well.

If you have any comments - good or bad - please don't hesitate to give us any feedback on info@toogoodtogo.com.

At Too Good To Go, we’re always doing our best to make it even easier for you to save great surplus food. Make sure to keep the app updated so you’re always in the loop with what’s new. Thank you for being a food hero and helping us reduce food waste worldwide.

*On the menu:*
- We’d love to know more about your food-saving experiences, so you can now rate your purchases in the app.
- You can also edit all of your personal info and settings in the app.

We’ve also fixed several bugs, among other:
- iPhone Plus and iPad no longer gets logged out when trying to open settings
- Crash on receipts page
- Better handling of payments that are not allowed by your bank

We've been busy in the kitchen improving app stability and reliability! We've also added a few new features...

- "Offline receipts" are here! You can now redeem your mobile reciept without a 4G or wi-fi connection.
- We've introduced the "new store badge", helping you to spot new stores in the app.
- You can now use 3D Touch to perform various actions and shortcuts in the app (iPhone 6S or above).
We've been busy in the kitchen improving app stability and reliability!

We've been working on the main ingredients of the app for this release, focusing on the things that make everything work smoothly. There are a tonne of bugfixes and stability improvements included, as well as an improved map view. That means that the map now supports multiple stores in one location.

We've been working on the main ingredients of the app for this release, focusing on the things that make everything work smoothly. There are a tonne of bugfixes and stability improvements included, as well as an improved map view. That means that the map now supports multiple stores in one location.

We've been working on the main ingredients of the app for this release, focusing on the things that make everything work smoothly. There are a tonne of bugfixes and stability improvements included, as well as an improved map view. That means that the map now supports multiple stores in one location.

We've been improving the recipe of the app, to make it even more delicious. We've improved stability as well as tweaking here and there to improve your experience. Last but not least, you can now add comments when rating your meal!

We've been improving the recipe of the app, to make it even more delicious. We've improved stability as well as tweaking here and there to improve your experience. Last but not least, you can now add comments when rating your meal!

As a special treat, our chefs have spruced up the receipts in the app. You now have a countdown timer to collection so you never miss a meal, as well as being able to see how much CO2 you have prevented!
We’ve also been busy cooking up delicious bug fixes and performance improvements.

We've added new ingredients to the app, as well as improving the existing ones. You’ll now have better app stability, as well as an improved user experience. One of our favourite additions is a direct link to our blog in the app menu, for easy access to useful tips to help you reduce food waste!
Our chefs have been busy exterminating bugs in the kitchen! Thanks to a few tweaks, you'll now have a more streamlined app experience and faster loading times on the map open function.

Presentation is key! In this version, we've improved the look of the app, making it even more appetising. We've also added a teaspoon of bug fixes to get the taste just right.

It's never been easier to discover unsold food with Too Good To Go! You can now choose exactly where you want to find food in addition to using your location. Even better - you can now pay using Apple Pay!

We've improved the menu by making access to important screens easier. Now, after you purchase, the bottom bar will provide easy access to your receipt and show your collection window. Additionally, we've revamped the settings and profile pages - completing this exquisite menu!
Our chefs have prepared the new 'Discover' tab for you. It makes finding and saving delicious food even easier!
Our chefs have prepared the new 'Discover' tab for you. It makes finding and saving delicious food even easier!
